nodes.text:
@nytimesworld 
Derek Chauvin lynched only Gerorge Floyed and is in jail now.
Trump delayed support and caused more than 3000 Puerto Ricans´ death and many other death, injury and economic expenses in other cases, but is still free and show neither any regret.
USA is no democracy.
